name: Game of West: Legends&Roses
description:
The Ultra Wild West Simulation RPG.
In this Simulation RPG, you need to hang on tight for a Wild Wild West ride! Become the legend of the West, run a thriving town, date glamorous lovers and form an awesome fighting force to expand your territory while protecting your people from enemies!

Features:
◆ Wild Wild West Adventure
◎ Gunfight, duels, trading, building army, massive battles, finding love… Anything and everything you would want in exploring the frontiers!
◎ Lead everyone on the frontier to fight against enemies!
◎ Win every duel and outmaneuver the outlaws! Be the Boss of Legends!

◆Run Your Town
◎ Run the most fabulous town in the West!
◎ Manage all the crucial venues, the Mine, Farm, Barrack, Prison… Earn gold to finance your fighting force!

◆Recruit Heroes of the West
◎ Billy the Kid, Jesse James, Butch Cassidy, Wyatt Earp...All the heroes will help you defeat the enemies and become a frontier legend.
◎ Command real historical figures, use their capabilities wisely to get an edge!
◎ Train your heroes, procure the best arms, and build a legendary fighting force to win your glory!

◆Romancing the West
◎ Go on a thrilling adventure of the heart as well as land!
◎ Find the love of your life from the mysterious beauties of the west.
◎ Raise a family together! Your offspring will be the key to building a thriving West.
